application_services.{module_name}_services.py: Coordinates domain and adapter layers for actions from this module

interfaces.{module_name}_interface.py: Defines abstract methods for interactions related to the domain from this module

models.{module_name}.py: Holds the core domain logic and entities for this module

api.routes.py: Define the HTTP endpoints (GET, POST, etc.) for this module
api.schemas.py: Defines Pydantic models for data validation and serialization for this module

{module_name}.services.py: Here you will implement the core business logic for that module
